amendment.description: To extend military extraterritorial jurisdiction to cover not only personnel and contractor personal of the Department of Defense, but also personal and contractor personnel of any Federal agency or provisional authority supporting the mission of the Department of Defense overseas, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3372 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3372 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S6863-6864) To extend military extraterritorial jurisdiction to cover not only personnel and contractor personal of the Department of Defense, but also personal and contractor personnel of any Federal agency or provisional authority supporting the mission of the Department of Defense overseas, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3372 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3372 proposed by Senator Sessions.
